reviewData.reviewPreview: Poor taste. Milk and matcha taste separated. There is no synergy in this flavor.
reviewData.altText: A dark, murky green matcha latte with some ice.

reviewData.reviewPreview: A light, refreshing taste with a hint of sweetness, but watered down.
reviewData.altText: A light green matcha, half drank, with minimal ice.

reviewData.reviewPreview: Terrible, bitter, chalky, chunky, and grainy. Akin to drinking sand.
reviewData.altText: A light green matcha latte with many dark matcha grains speckled throughout the drink. Beneath the drink is a pink napkin that says 'I love you so Matcha!'

reviewData.reviewPreview: Not a latte... This is a saccharine milkshake.
reviewData.altText: A very pale green, thick matcha with a sugary foam on its surface.

reviewData.reviewPreview: This is a vanilla ice cream milkshake, not a matcha latte...

reviewData.altText: A dark green to white gradient of matcha to milk.

reviewData.reviewPreview: A heavy, sweet taste. Chalky and low quality, but decent.
